title: buff lucian?
body: lucian needs his double shot damage increased a tad, or his aa range increased? thoughts

replies.body: I personally would like his slow immunity from E back, that was nice against Nasuses and other OP slows.

i personally think that lucian should get 550 range back maybe even make it so he gets 500/525/550 range as he lvl's up because as strong as lucian is I cannot even auto attack the tank without getting instagibbed because of the short range

> [{quoted}](name=Lauricella3,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=vo0bo5Gq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-15T12:25:03.597+0000)
>
> i personally think that lucian should get 550 range back maybe even make it so he gets 500/525/550 range as he lvl's up because as strong as lucian is I cannot even auto attack the tank without getting instagibbed because of the short range

position better, get support to peel and assist

kite
use his passive to refresh e cooldown

The only thing I can think off is getting his AA increased a little bit. I must say that he has pitifully low range, and while he does have a dash and a long range poke if aimed right, as soon as laning is over Lucian sort of falls off real fast.
